official_title: A resolution resolved, that there shall be paid out of the contingent fund of the House, until otherwise provided by law, compensation for the employment of one additional official reporter of debates, House of Representatives, to be appointed in the same manner, and to receive the same rate of compensation, as the other official reporters of debates.

summary.text: Provides that there shall be paid out of the contingent fund of the House, until otherwise provided by law, compensation for the employment of one additional official reporter of debates, House of Representatives, to be appointed in the same manner, and to receive the same rate of compensation, as the other official reporters of debates.

titles.title: A resolution resolved, that there shall be paid out of the contingent fund of the House, until otherwise provided by law, compensation for the employment of one additional official reporter of debates, House of Representatives, to be appointed in the same manner, and to receive the same rate of compensation, as the other official reporters of debates.
